p: An article from Flanders in Belgium reports research linked to action research. Dietlinde Willockx and Leen Dom describe an action research project that aimed to find out in what ways and with what materials childcare settings can bring ‘raising for a sustainable society’ into a lived practice and what kind of support they need to accomplish that. The authors discuss in what ways the SDG framework provided a stepstone to overcome barriers to work on sustainability, but also how it even created new barriers.
